pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Poisson Binomial Distribution // Implementation of both the exact and approximation methods for computing the cdf of the Poisson binomial distribution as described in Hong (2013) doi: 10.1016/j.csda.2012.10.006. It also provides the pmf, quantile function, and random number generation for the Poisson binomial distribution. The C code for fast Fourier transformation (FFT) is written by R Core Team (2019)https://www.R-project.org/, which implements the FFT algorithm in Singleton (1969) doi: 10.1109/TAU.1969.1162042.
